entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who is speaking to Harry. He is described as being beside Harry and reseating himself behind his desk.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is having a conversation with Dumbledore. He is described as leaving the floor to fall back onto the rug in front of Dumbledore's desk.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is mentioned as someone who asked a question and failed to get an answer.

relationships.description: Riddle asked a question of Dumbledore.
Riddle asked a question of Harry.
Dumbledore mentions that the memory has been tampered with.
